about_the_game:
ATOM RPG: Trudograd - Supporter Pack

Supporter Pack for ATOM RPG: Trudograd was created for those players who have already purchased the game, but still want to support our small team.

Some items featured in the kit are unique versions of things available in the base game for everyone. While they can make the first few hours of the game easier for certain character builds, they do not have any long term effects on player progression in the long run. The main reason for their creation is to thank you for your support!

Thank you for being with us, and let there be... ATOM!

Supporter Pack includes:
  • All the music from the game in high quality;
  • Loading screen art in high resolution;
  • Unique winter camouflage suit "Avalanche", which increases the player's stealth and changes their appearance;
  • Flare gun SPSh-44 with cartridges for it;
  • ATOM thermos, capable of keeping beverages hot even in the most severe weather;
  • ATOM backpack, functional yet roomy;
  • Unique color set for special armor "ATOM Fury";
  • New location "Airdrop site", where you can find all the items included in the set. ATOM does not forget its best agents and always aims to support them with resources and ammunition!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has graphic violence (blood and partial dismemberment). The game features topics of drug, tobacco and alcohol abuse as well as some mature language and sexual themes.

detailed_description:
ATOM RPG: Trudograd - Supporter Pack

Supporter Pack for ATOM RPG: Trudograd was created for those players who have already purchased the game, but still want to support our small team.

Some items featured in the kit are unique versions of things available in the base game for everyone. While they can make the first few hours of the game easier for certain character builds, they do not have any long term effects on player progression in the long run. The main reason for their creation is to thank you for your support!

Thank you for being with us, and let there be... ATOM!

Supporter Pack includes:
  • All the music from the game in high quality;
  • Loading screen art in high resolution;
  • Unique winter camouflage suit "Avalanche", which increases the player's stealth and changes their appearance;

  • ATOM backpack, functional yet roomy;
  • Unique color set for special armor "ATOM Fury";
  • New location "Airdrop site", where you can find all the items included in the set. ATOM does not forget its best agents and always aims to support them with resources and ammunition!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 6670 2GB
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA (1 GB VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA (2 GB VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
